definitions.definition: a tendency to expect the best , or at least, a favourable outcome
examples: I love her youth, her beauty and above all her optimism that everything will turn out fine.

definitions.definition: the doctrine that this world is the best of all possible worlds
the belief that good will eventually triumph over evil

main_definition: a tendency to expect the best , or at least, a favourable outcome
secondary_definitions: the doctrine that this world is the best of all possible worlds
the belief that good will eventually triumph over evil
